name: Liyat G Haile x Donald Silverstein

metadata.name: Colours of the Dream
metadata.description:
The colourful personality of Jimi Hendrix, the iconic musician, is brought out in this piece through the use of colour gradients, layers and photography applied to the original image captured by Donald Silverstein in 1967. The floral design on Hendrix's shirt was the inspiration behind the addition of my own flower photography bursting out of the borders, which also mirrors the ways Jimi played his guitar with no boundaries.


The photograph used to create this artwork was originally curated and commissioned by LostShoots as part of ‘Frame 69’ - a collaborative NFT project with multiple artists.  
The same single frame (film negative #69) from the 1967 shoot between photographer Donald Silverstein & musician Jimi Hendrix has been licensed to each artist taking part, with kind permission of the Silverstein Family Estate.  
Each artwork within ‘Frame 69’ is a new 1/1 artwork, minted on the artists own smart contract, and curated by Lost Shoots / Matt Humphrey. 

Original photograph © Donald Silverstein / The Silverstein Family Estate. All rights reserved. 

This artwork is created by Liyat G Haile


License: 
Can be used to display privately, or in non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. 
The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.  
Provides no commercial rights.  
Provides no editorial rights.

Contact: lostshoots@gmail.com
